name: ROOSTA
description:
A cute little roguelike created for the "I can't draw, but I want to make a game" Jam in June 2020.

You're a Rooster!  On a beach!  Try to survive the waves of enemies, while grabbing as many unique new abilities as possible.  You'll need them in the later levels.

Arrow keys to move.

Bump enemies to attack

Number keys to preform special abilities
